attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the past 12 months Jacqui Smith has shown herself to be unfit to lead any department of government, or hold office at all.

She has gone from one scandal to another while being let off relatively scot-free.

It is clear from her constituents that she is no longer wanted, please remove her.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
